response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you, which I believe would greatly benefit your needs. This exceptional item carries a significant value of $15,000 to me due to its unique features and the time invested in its development. Considering its worth to you stands at $8,000, I am extending an exclusive offer to purchase it at a price that reflects its true value to both parties. I kindly request your consideration at $12,000. Thank you for your time and interest.", "product_price": 12000}
